title: The authority shall acquire the land under reservation in lieu of RCC only when it is immediately required for development or creation of amenity or services or utilities
clause_text: The authority shall acquire the land under reservation in lieu of RCC only when it is immediately required for development or creation of amenity or services or utilities.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
